content.detailedDescription: I was fishing for smelt with my family at the singing bridge drain.  the clouds were very low that night and i was shining my flashlight on them.  i could see the milky way's stars through an opening in the cloud cover and a dark circular object passed accross the opening, blotting out the stars.  it was solid and appeared black in the night sky,through in sun light it may have been any color. it also had dim, white or gray lights in from the perimiter all the way around it.  i would guess there were about a total of ten lights. it made no sound and was only visable for about two seconds or less. i am an artist and retain visual images very well.  i told my family what i saw and while demonstrating the flashlight on the clouds, it passed accross another opening in the clouds and my stepmother and i both saw it that time.  that view lasted about half as long as the first sighting. it happened on friday april 16, 1971.
content.summary: Was seen passing silently accross opening in very low cloud cover.

content.detailedDescription:
The reporting witness was a resident at 1025 hickory, kcmo, 64101 in 2008.
he would go up on the rooftop at night with his telescope and video camera.  one night he was on the rooftop and saw three spherical objects traveling together as one with no lights that passed overhead and continued towards wheeler municipal downtown airport.  he stated that he took video and posted it on you-tube under his name titles moving stars but this fi could not find it.  he stated that he phoned the airport but thay had no knowledge about what he was describing.  he was physically scared and left the rooftop in a hurry.
content.summary: Watching stars on rooftop, saw spherical objects

content.detailedDescription:
My first ufo sighting was in 1967. i am not certain just when it happened, but i know that there were two tv shows playing that night. one was “mr. terrific” and the other was “captain nice.”  i remember this because i enjoyed those programs.

we lived in the outskirts of the city of lancaster, california. my dad worked as a ranch hand on a greek alfalfa ranch for augustus eliopoulos. 
our home was located at approximately latitude 34°43'18.16"n, longitude 118°15'13.62"w.
my sisters and i were playing out in a field. i was about 10 years old at the time, as best as i can recall. my sister (darlene) was 3 years younger than i; and out baby sister (calisa) was 5 years younger than i. 

as we were playing in the field, i looked up and toward the western sky over the tehachapi mountains. i saw some kind of contrail going up into the air over the mountains. however, it was following a zig-zag course ... not a straight line. my sisters stopped and stared at this strange scene taking place in the setting sun. (it was late evening). 

then, whatever the object was that was rising into the air on this zig-zag course ... suddenly exploded! we were just children, but we knew something important and just happened. i remember that we went running back to the house, darlene holding on to my pockets, and calisa holding on behind her. we were all yelling, “emergency! emergency!” (lol).

by the time we got back to the house, the sun had set and there was no sign of the explosion in the sky over the mountains. at least ... not at first. then we started to see a huge cloud of blue green (gas?) hovering in the sky above us. it seemed to slowly pulse. i remember my mom & dad and my grandmother came out to look at it and we were all baffled by whatever it was. 

i heard later that there was a short article about it in the local paper, but no one knew what it was. i have not been able to find any reference to this article, unfortunately.

at the time, i was not thinking “ufo” or anything like that at all. i was just freaked out about this strange phenomenon which happened over our home.
content.summary: This took place in 1967. my 2 sisters were with me. my family witnessed this.

content.detailedDescription: Reporting witness related the story told to him by his father robert that occurred in 1965 at his residence near loose park, kcmo after dark.  robert and his neighbor were outside when they saw an object in the night sky.  they both could see panels on the object.  the object made no sound.  when the object passed overhead, robert phoned the police department to report it.  robert was informed by the police department that there was a bi-plane flying around with advertisments on it. this made no sense to the two witnesses as it was low enough to see that it did not have any wings, engine sound, or lights.
content.summary: Historical case 1965 loose park, kansas city, mo.

content.detailedDescription:
First of all, i want to say that the reason i'm reporting this is because there were other aircraft in the air at the time, which must have seen this too. planes were heading to john wayne airport and tustin police helicopters were circling over the i5 at redhill av. in tustin. ca. my sense is that the object was very large and faraway. even in relationship to the aircraft heading to john wayne airport, it was small, yet bigger than a bird, and clearly outlined with a defined edge. the commercial aircraft had to have seen it too, but it would have been west of their flight path.

i was headed out the common driveway of the complex where i live when i saw this object silhouetted against high cirrus clouds about 6:30 p.M. it hovered and wobbled and remained stationary in one place for about thirty minutes.  i drove and finally got out of the car to view it at the corner of nisson and redhill. with my naked eye it seemed to have a classic saucer shape with a rim and a dome, yet at other times it appeared oval and elongated. again, i had the sense that it was very large and far away. it was at about 40 degrees above the horizon and it is hard to estimate the altitude compared to the aircraft which were very low and visable, in descent to land, as this area is under the flight path to the john wayne airport. since the sun was setting behind it in the west, the object was clearly silhouetted as a shape, but not dimensional.

i watched it for almost a half hour, but no one else was watching. traffic heading north on the i5 at this time would have had a perfect view. i am not ufo crazy, yet i always keep my eye on the sky having seen something spectacular many years ago. at first i thought "drone" but this was far away and solid and stationary. i had a feeling of wonder and awe. i had to leave it because i had an appointment in irvine, but driving north on culver about 6:40 p.M., i looked west at the interesection of walnut avenue and it was still there. i am so sorry i didn't have my camera. [there is a video produced today 10/3/14 on utube with the tag orange county, but the footage is not what i saw]
content.summary: Orange county ca, saucer shaped object  hovering about 40 degrees above horizon. shape shfited to oval at times. a lot of air traffic in the air at the time, including helicopters.

content.detailedDescription: At 3:39 pm i was looking up to see jets flying when i noticed an orb like object hovering at a high altitude in the sky. i pulled over to observe the object at palmer park and academy in the leon gessie pizza parking lot. i quickly saw a second object exactly like the first and then in a matter of moments saw a third to the west of the 2 in what appeared to be a symmetrical triangle. jets were making passes by the 2 closest to my vantage point. then suddenly the 3rd at the tip of what was the triangle formation started moving quickly west. it made no sound and left no com trail. it was followed by the f-15s and they did not return to the 2 objects that remained. they were orb like, round, reflective and glimmering white. they were very high in the sky at what seemed to be about 30 thousand feet or higher. they remained perfectly in line with each other as they slowly moved out of sight due to cloud cover and the suns direction. the sighting lasted about 50 minutes. this was absolutely astounding! i did get video and pictures on my cell phone which did not due the event justice. there were also other people who observed them as well. amazing! i have never experienced anything like this. i can not explain what i saw. i truly believe what i saw were ufo's.
content.summary: I observed 3 ufo's hovering in a symeterical patern at what seemed like 30,000 feet.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving over bridge in boston and i observed a bright green glowing streak in the sky, similar to a small comet. it descended and appeared to have crashed/landed somewhere near boston/brookline area.
approximate size of a golf ball it appeared to be about a mile away towards the south.
content.summary: Green glowing object that appeared to be a small comet, descended about a mile away as i was driving west near boston.

content.detailedDescription: Heading north on the freeway, i and one other person observed a distant triangular light pattern in the sky near the ludington pumped storage plant. i watched as it hovered, we went around a curve in the freeway and it was gone. the object had three white lights and appeared almost transparent. the object was hovering for 30 seconds. it disappeared shortly after i noticed it.
content.summary: Hovering triangular object, light pattern.

content.detailedDescription:
On 9-23-2014, near as makes no difference, at 1315, from my work station, looking northward, i noticed a small, shiny ball bearing type of craft, straight line flight, moving from right to left at very high speed. i noticed it only because i had my amber vision flip shades down. when i flipped them up, i could not see it. flipped down, it was visible again. strange, it's surface apparently able to be "invisible" when viewed with the naked eye. but the amber flips made it visible. the suns light was reflecting off this object. that's what i saw. perhaps with the amber flips down, it could still impossible to see. i believe i got lucky. it would have only taken a few moments with a customer, and i never would have noticed. another time of day. a different position of the sun. never would have seen it. it's almost like ufo lottery. i was at the right place at the right time with my amber flips down, looking in the right direction. what was that thing?  

now, the first time i've ever seen this. after this thing zipped by, passenger jets were flying in generally the same direction, west. i counted 5, seperated by moments and different elevations.

well, those are my six experiences. don't judge me harshly. i'm relieved to finally get this out there. i don't care what happens anymore.
content.summary: Twice seen. what are these things?

content.detailedDescription:
Around 4 am, during a driving paper route, approaching a 3 way intersection, breaking out of the treeline, looking eastward out the front passenger window, i noticed 4 round, large white lights. i said to the driver, "check that out, pull over, stop." we got out and watched it, hovering. then in sequence, from aft to front, one by one, off-off-off-off...............Then back on again, on-on-on-on. after a some seconds, off-off-off-off, and then nothing. no noise. no apparent indication or resemblence to any commonly known manmade vehicle. 

this marks my 5th sighting and the first one i consider a traditional ufo. 

the shape of the craft was impossible to see. it was just barely dawn, all that was visible were the lights. 

i know others saw it and filmed it. i cannot find the footage anywhere. i have not seen it in any ufo documentary, or in other media. except, during an intro of a documentary, in a splash collage of ufo's. so, someone, out there, somewhere has the footage and only you know who you are. whatever it was/is, this 
is the only one of six experiences of mine, seen by other people, i do not know and never met.
content.summary: 4 round white lights on/off in sequence

content.detailedDescription: I was with some friends going into philly that night and as i was crossing the bridge, i saw three bluish-white lights in a triangular fashion blink at the same time. the triangular craft appeared to turn, because the lights turned in a circular fashion. however, it appeared to follow a straight-line path for about 10 or 15 seconds. i couldn't make out any more details of the craft because it was very dark outside. this was my first ufo sighting, and something about it felt very extraterrestrial!
content.summary: Was driving into philly that night with some friends, and saw 3 blinking lights in a triangular shape move slowly across the sky.

content.detailedDescription: At 3:30 pm mount. time i was waiting for my bus when the afb started the fly over for a funeral for a pilot shot down in afghanistan or something, so, ilooked on only to see on the second pass an orb glimmer from the sun in the sw the son setting west of it. the planes hit the afterburners snd it was very loud and drew my view to them in the north heading ne and banking around for another pass when i noticed above the one jet leaving the formation another orb quickly just shot in from the nw to the ne over the airshow then slightly east another orb just appesred there all 3 are just sitting there the clouds are whisking by but the don't move for over an hour no movement. 30 mins into the event i stop people in the parking lot to show them the orbs they were transfixed and we got pictures as well even my bus drover got photos..Can't believe this happened to me wow........!!!
content.summary: 1 orb appeared as the 4 planes in the funeral airshow made 2nd round pass then i saw another orb desend from like space no com trail

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my apartment and woke up around 5:20 a.M. or so and meditated from 5:30-6 a.M.  at six a.M. i made morning coffee and by 6:15 a.M. i was sitting on my couch, sipping on coffee, looking out the window admiring the beautiful sunrise.  

as i was sitting on my couch, i noticed a light in the sky that wasn’t moving, it just hovered, and it was really bright.  naturally, i began staring at it.  then i grabbed my phone to take pictures, which i did.  there was a large, bright, cylinder/sphere shaped object hovering in the sky for about 45 minutes, nearby it was another white round orb like glow, and out of this white glowing light another one emerged, or maybe the one split into two, i am not sure but where there was one there were now two.  then the third one disappeared.  throughout this entire ordeal there was no noise at all. 
 
sometime within that 45 minute window i noticed a passenger plane fly toward the trajectory of the object and turn around headed back in the direction it came, but i do live close to the airport.  i also saw another plane approach the general area, and this plane left those white trails behind then flew away.  then at 7 a.M. i got up to take a shower and the objects seemed to have vanished.    

after getting out of the shower i noticed marks on my chest.  there were two small puncture wounds on my right ics 3 area very close to my sternum.  i have noticed these marks before but never thought anything of them.  to me, i always thought they were insect bites of some sort.  so, that morning i didn’t think any different.
content.summary: One large object hovering, one glowing white orb then either split into two or another emerged from the one

content.detailedDescription: I was stopped at a red light at the intersection, and looked up to see a bright, greenish-white orb of light move across the sky. it appeared to leave a white trail, maybe a fireball. it didn't look that far up in the sky, pretty close actually. after 3 or 4 seconds it just disappeared in the clouds. i was thinking it was a meteor, or space debris entering the atmosphere or something, but part of me feels it was extraterrestrial.
content.summary: Looked up to see a bright, greenish-white light/orb move across the sky, leaving a trail and disappearing in the clouds. very strange.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my backyard approximately 7:30-8:00 pm, when i noticed a glowing red ball in the distance, coming from the horizon, heading in my direction. i stared at it in disbelief as it came closer, appearing larger and brighter as it approached. there was no sound from this object, no blinking lights, just a large, pulsating ball of glowing red-orange light. this object flew directly over my home, i went inside to get my wife and children, who then witnessed this too. as we were watching, another identical object approached from the same location as the 1st (just miles from a nuclear plant), and was on the exact course as the first, flying directly over our home. we watched as it flew in a northeasttward direction, toward the river. then, one after another, they came, 5 in total, all on the exact same course, disappearing over the treetops and out of view. a neighbor had come out by this time, and was able to witness the 5th "fireball". my wife had recorded 2 of the objects flying over our house, as with no streetlights in our neighborhood, they were very bright and showed well on camera.
content.summary: Multiple fireballs

content.detailedDescription: Me and my mom went to get a halloween costumes and we were in the spelling lot and i saw three lights my mom didn't belive they were ufos  until they shot at us
content.summary: About 10 to 20 minutes long

content.detailedDescription:
This next event, the 4th in my life, is something i cannot bottle up anymore. it's been over 20 years. even as i type this, i am genuinely scared. and all because of a pee break. 
early morning, approximately 4 am, during a television commercial break, i got up and went to pee. on my way there, out of the corner of my left eye, i noticed, through the window, what appeared to be, someone trespassing, walking in our driveway using a flashlight. immediately, i thought vandalism to the cars or raiding the garden. i went to the backdoor, there are two doors to walk through. inner main door, outer screen door. the inner door is metal and uses a skeleton key. not exactly a stealthy combination when you are trying to sneak up on an intruder. well whatever it was did not seem to be aware of my presence until i was standing on the landing looking at it. we made "eye contact" and then the thing morphed into a machine and approached me, rising up to my level.

sorry for the capslock, but, i am keeping, what this thing looked like to myself....Until i can speak with either, stanton friedman and/or bill birnes. 

i'll bet now you really do think i'm crazy. 

i'm scared about this. please don't think me wonko. 

the rest of this story only comes out with a face to face conversation.

i am not seeking publicity.

i am not seeking money.   

what happened to me was real. i just want talk about it. privately! 

i'm just an average joe, and i'm tired of holding it in. 

i've never reported anything until today, prompted by my most recent sighting. it all came rushing back and i feel strongly about telling of all, my 6 experiences. but this one is the biggie. after all this time, it still bothers me.
content.summary: The one event that i don't want to hold in anymore.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking with my granddaughter along the north border of meadowbrook pond.  the water was low because we've had very little rain.  we found a circle in a muddy area usually covered with water.  the circle was probably made today or last night since we had light rain the few days before.  the circle, which seemed to be "perfect" though incomplete, was about 10 feet in circumference and about 2/3 complete. it looked new.  the groove making the circle was about 4-5" across and very even.  there were no foot prints in the area.  however, there were diamond shaped markings a few inches across in the area where the circle was absent.  the circle was about one inch deep and the plants in the area of the circle were flattened, suggesting that whatever made the circle came from above. my 11-year-old granddaughter, who is a real skeptic, was a bit freaked out by the circle. we didn't have a camera so i didn't get any photos.  since it is supposed to rain tomorrow i'll try to get back in the morning before it rains and get some photos.
content.summary: Circle in mud.

content.detailedDescription: I came into my town of alma colorado this morning and several residents were at the community store looking up to the sky. they pointed out three orb's of light hovering in the southeast sky. they were stationary and formed a triangle. the store owner told me they had been there since at least 7 in the morning. i went home and the lights never changed locations. i continued to watch the lights for two more hours! then one light slowly broke from the triangle and formed a straight line. it moved very slowly. it took a good ten minutes to move from it's original point in triangle to it's point in the straight line. it then slowly moved off out of my view. i do have some pics. but they don't show much.
content.summary: Three orb's of light hovering in same location for several hours! hundreds of witnesses.

content.detailedDescription: This has been a long time ago but i just wanted to tell the story. i have told it before but most seem not to believe it. my mother and i were on our way to work. she was driving. we were in a small vw beetle. we worked in a factory about 25 miles from where we lived in another co. we had to be at work at 7:00 a.M. so we usually left home about an hour or so before in order to get there on time and to sit in the break room for awhile so mom could have some coffee. we were probably about 1-2 miles or so from work. we were on a flat straight area of road. all of a sudden i saw two strange looking objects from my side of the car. what i saw were 2 top shaped objects hovering over the small transformer station that powered the factory. i remember a row of colored lights going around about the middle and seemed to be either rotating or flashing in sequence to the left while the bottom seemed to be spinning to the right. i didn't get a very long look at them because i yelled to mom pull over, pull over! by this time she had seen them too. as soon as we pulled over they took off in a shot! i couldn't believe it. we had just seen a ufo. i'd always been interested in ufos, the paranormal etc. now what makes this really interesting is after we got to work (we were telling everybody) 2 other ladies from where we lived and also worked at the same factory came in all excited saying they had just seen a ufo at the same place. so they came back after me and my mom left. it never really dawned on me till years later. was that why when there were a couple of times when we got to work that they had sent us home because the transformer was out? my mom and i watched the skies after that. there was another time in 1975 but that is different than this incident.
content.summary: Early morning while on the way to work.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my back yard heading to my garage back door, when i looked to my right and noticed a reflective cylindrical object moving towards the south approximately 10,000ft. airspeed appeared to be slower than a commercial aircraft for that altitude, this is what caught my attention. i listened for the sound delay, but it never came. i ran into the garage to grab my video camera with a 40x optical zoom to get a better look, but i could not find it in my view finder. i never pushed record.  i could still see it with my eye, but could never obtain a lock. it went behind some trees and i lost it.
content.summary: Subject looked like a commercial aircraft fuselage without wings and control surfaces.

content.detailedDescription:
In 1993, a friend and i were weekend cruising, beautiful day, bright and sunny, partly cloudy afternoon enjoying the scenery. between noeltner rd. and mill point rd. on rt. 161, while we were parked, and looking back at the shrine, we noticed and observed what looked like, a flare gun shot, but spherical. it was yellow/orange, like a schoolbus, it looked electrically fuzzy. like a ball of some kind of plasmic energy. it appeared from behind a cloud. strange, it darted from hiding to appearing, from right to left, as if it were playing peek-a-boo with us. this went on, for at least 15 minutes. we sat there watching it, making jokes, having absolutely no clue whatsoever what it was. it did not interact with us directly, but it did seem to know we were there, as it seemed, so we thought, to be playing with us. several times, it was the same thing over and over, "peekabo, look at me! here i am!" then quickly dart back behind the cloud. yes, the same cloud. by the way, that day, beautiful calm day, clouds moving east'ish slowly.

now, this may seem like a one-off, throw away, but, on another day, same year, randomly chosen, we, same friend and i, saw the same thing, from the same spot. behaving exactly as before. don't know what is was, but that's what we saw.

this marks the 2nd and 3rd sighting of my life, of seeing an object in the sky i could not identify.

i have two more reports to submit.
content.summary: A small

content.detailedDescription: So me and my friend were sitting on the porch just smoking a cigarette when i noticed what i thought was a meteor. but as it came into my field of view it didn't burn out like i expected it to . strangely enough it kept moving in a straight line across the sky towards the northeast. we watched it until it went out of view then just sat in awe since neither of us had ever seen anything like it before.
content.summary: Looked like a large meteor  that kept moving in a straight line  and didnt burn out, just went out of vie

content.detailedDescription:
It was summertime, of best guess, 1978. i wasn't 10 years old yet, but i was playing little league baseball and i had a paper route. so that puts the event between 1977 - 1979. it may have been late june, but most likely, this happened in the second half of summer. the sun was going down, but still, plenty of daylight remaining. it was a beautiful day. clear and crisp blue sky. no clouds. no precipitation. nothing. the temperature was perfect. probably between 65-70ºf. it was either a saturday or a sunday. my gut tells me it was sunday. present that day and observing were, myself, mother, father(deceased), brother, brother, brother and an aunt(deceased). we were outside, in the backyard, enjoying a barbeque and the weather. then someone saw it. i cannot remember exactly who saw it first, but one of us noticed another looking up into nothing, and asked, "what the heck are you looking at?" it was then we all looked skyward and saw what appeared to be a small, spherical object, hovering and stationary, reflecting the light of the sun. i describe it as a small, shiny and polished ball bearing. we observed this object for a couple of minutes. then our neighbor and aunt came outside. we asked her if she could see it and she replied, "see what?" and we responded, while pointing at the object, "that shiny thing right there!" she turned to look, was a bit taken aback, and said, "what the hell is that?" after another few minutes, the object was no longer visible. it is my belief, that whatever the object was, did not disappear. rather, it became unseeable, most likely because, by that time, the sun had moved on and our sight line put us out of viewing the reflection. 

     none of us have any clue what it is. but there was definitely an object present in the sky!!! it was not an airplane. it was not a helicopter. it was not any commonly known manmade aerial object! no sound. no wings. no emissions. no appendages. nothing. just a small, shiny, polished chrome looking ball bearing.

this event marks the first time in my life i observed an object in the sky i could not identify. what is also strange, is that this is not the only time an object, similar to the aforementioned object, has been observed. that event marks my sixth sighting, and it happened this year. in fact, it is because of my most recent sighting, that i am no longer back. i will send reports, in chronological order of the remaining five sightings.

thank you.
content.summary: It looked like a shiny, polished chrome ball bearing. hovering. motionless. no sound.

content.detailedDescription:
Was sitting in my garage with a friend having a garage sale at about 11:00am on a friday morning october 3rd, 2014. i looked up towards the mountains watching planes make chem. trails. saw a funny dark line in the east towards the san jacinto mountains. was not moving. initially was on its side, thought at first was a line of balloons but was not moving in the breeze. got my binoculars out. saw a solid object dark, black cigar shaped object. it slowly from its horizontal position to a vertical position very slowly, took several minutes to do this. still in same location. asked my neighbor to come look at it, he saw it, did not know what it was either. watched with binoculars on and off for 15 minutes. it would turn slightly to its side which showed a shinny reflective solid smooth face (no balloon shapes). it seemed to be moving slowly away towards the mountains but laterally. i turned around for no more than a few seconds, looked back and it was gone. it was not a plane, balloon, parachute or helicopter. i know what those things look like. don't know what it was but it was unfamiliar and unidentified to me. i was so excited to see something unidentified and so strange. 
i did not have a camera on hand to take a picture, actually, was so interested in the object, did not even think to go get one.
content.summary: Sitting in garage during garage sale, saw odd elongated dark object in sky towards mountains, did not move. then disapeared

content.detailedDescription:
I was trying to record the strange noise outside that i hear all the time. so i setup my mic and started the test recording on my laptop and then i looked up and seen the object so i grabbed my camera and started recording the object. about 5 minutes later i seen it again by the time i turned on my camera had gone.
location of event: maghull  near liverpool
time of event: 7:21pm uk time
date of event: friday 3 october 2014
content.summary: Weird

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i camped at weston pass campground thursday night, oct 2. early in the still-dark early morning hours of friday, oct 3, i'm guessing about 5 am, i awoke to stare at a light in the sky that looked like a bright star descending through the thin tree branches. i was sleeping in the back of a jeep grand cherokee, looking out the side window pretty much north, perhaps slightly nne in direction. the star descended perhaps 1/3 of the window height from my vantage point, hovered still for a couple seconds, then descended smoothly but quickly about the same vertical distance a second time. this time it stayed hovering in the sky for another minute or two while i stared at it carefully to see if it was going to move again. it didn't and i went back to sleep. i figured the sighting was perhaps a trick of perception since i was just waking up. i had the impression it was putting on a show for me to observe, but what are the odds? anyway, i was the only witness, so it didn't seem like a significant sighting to report, but i did describe it to my wife when we woke up. however, when we arrived home later in the day we discovered that there was a sighting early today in breckenridge. (we left the campground early and actually drove through breckenridge about 9:40 am, although we didn't see anything then.) i had taken a gps reading at our camp site... 39.07745,-106.13648. looking on google maps, breckenridge is located just a little east of due north of our camp site, exactly the direction i was looking when i saw the light. it appeared to be in the far distance, and very easily could have been near breckenridge at the time, although that's just a guess of course. while writing this report i was guessing an elevation angle of perhaps 20 degrees, but after measuring from my head location to the window and doing the math, the top of the window elevation angle is about 60 degrees. so my guess is the light descended  straight down from 60 deg down to about 45 deg in  a couple seconds, hovered there for maybe two more seconds, then descended smoothly but quickly on down to perhaps 20 or 30 deg elevation angle, where it stayed for the next full minute while i contemplated what i had just seen. the direction angle of my view (just a tad east of north) was deduced from google maps satellite view, the angle of our parking spot, and the direction i was looking across the inside of the parked vehicle.  i wasn't going to report this sighting, but it might provide additional evidence for whatever was seen in breckenridge early today.  at the time i'm writing this, 9news only reports three shiny objects in the early morning sky above that town.
content.summary: Star-like light in night sky descended, hovered, and then repeated

content.detailedDescription: In my back yard taking photos of deer.  it was dark - i took 3 separate photos within less than a minute.  didn't notice anything until i was reviewing the photos.  the second picture of the three i took had a very noticeable odd light form.  i was too busy focusing on the deer and didn't notice anything until i was reviewing my pictures.  there was no actual "sighting." the light form was in the second photo.
content.summary: Taking photo of deer. out of 3 photos taken in span of less than one minute, second photo has unknown light.

content.detailedDescription:
Ufo over lake erie
i was watching the 11 o'clock newscast in erie pa and at the end they always use a live camera shot from the top of the antenna camera. that night unlike others i noticed something out over the lake. it was moving slowly from right to left. much too slow to be a plane. and much larger than a helicopter. it doesn't appear to be blinking. it's a cigar shape with a small strip of light missing in the middle. i recorded it on my dvr and then recorded it with my phone. 
as many times as i have seen the end of this newscast and that same shot from the antenna camera i have never noticed anything out of the ordinary like this.
when played at normal speed it doesn't appear to be moving very fast. but i added a video when i fast forwarded and rewound the clip. also i noticed they played the clip abnormally long before the start of the next show. usually it's a couple seconds.
when i shared this video with friends some said it was a boat. but i watched the news during the day and after the newscast they used a day shot from the same camera so i recorded it and overlapped it with the night shot. and the object in question appears to me like it is above the water line. compared to the buildings and distance the object is pretty large.
just wondering if you could give me your professional opinion on the object and what you think it may be.
also after i contacted the news and asked the meteorologist what her thoughts were the next newscast the graphics were in the top right corner of the screen where the object was, as opposed to the bottom left. just thought that was a little odd .
content.summary: Ufo over lake erie

content.detailedDescription:
Called in to missouri mudon sd:
witness called the missouri mufon sd to inform her that while taking video of himself shooting at a golf driving range, he found something unknown
on the video when he reviewed it 2 weeks later.
content.summary: Something unknown seen on taped video event
